**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of why the new element or modfication of an existing element is necessary. Which use cases or needs does it address?

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to add or modify. Please try to also add examples (snippets for the tab-separated format, see https://github.com/HUPO-PSI/mzTab-M/blob/main/specification_documents/mzTab_format_specification_2_1-M.adoc#625-sample_processing1-n for reference)

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. If your request involves the use of other standards or external resources, please provide links to those.

**Submitter Tasks**
[ ] Provide a pull request (Please add the link)
[ ] Schema: Update mzTab_m_openapi.yml ([View File](https://github.com/HUPO-PSI/mzTab-M/blob/d1851e2781d0de12c5103d864188cd05d74f33c1/schema/mzTab_m_openapi.yml))

[ ] Example files: if possible, modify an existing or add a new example file ([Existing example files](https://github.com/HUPO-PSI/mzTab-M/tree/main/examples))

**Maintainer & WG Tasks**
[ ] Triage: Assign labels and Milestones to this issue. 
[ ] Discuss and review and approve PR.

Next Steps Once we reach an agreement on the changes above:
[ ] Create a downstream issue in the jmzTab-m repo (https://github.com/lifs-tools/jmzTab-m/issues)

[ ] Implement changes in R & Python implementations
